title: AI scheduling assistant for lawyers
pain: Scheduling client meetings and court appearances is manual and prone to conflicts
solution: Automated scheduler that integrates with case management and court calendars
key_risks: Requires integration with sensitive legal calendars
Law firms may resist adopting new technology

title: B2B influencer marketplace
pain: It's hard to find relevant influencers to promote niche B2B products
solution: Marketplace that matches B2B companies with micro‑influencers based on audience fit and industry
key_risks: Marketplace dynamics are hard to seed
Influencer marketing may not work for certain B2B niches
